turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on I-40 and MacArthur in Oklahoma City

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order the caramel cloud macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have an order for a caramel cloud macchiato with soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, what type of sauce comes on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Caramel.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the ingredients?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sugar, Corn Syrup, Butter, Water, Heavy Cream, Nonfat Dry Milk, Natural Flavors, Salt, Mono & Diglycerides, Soy Lecithin, and Sulfites.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Can I have one order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have an order for a caramel cloud macchiato with soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. Your order will be ready to pickup shortly. A receipt has been sent to your mobile phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Youre welcome.
